segments.text: Observing this, the kitchen feels lived-in and warm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's concentrating on that dish, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look, the sink is flooding!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling out, soaking everything nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, yet she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are mischievous, going for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on the stool, it's tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's ready to catch one, arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one slips on that floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene's full of little dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
